Split VG on AIX

  1. Add additional disks ( equal in size OR more )
    sudo extendvg <vgname> <new set of disks>
  2. Mirror the VG
    sudo mirrorvg <vgname> <new set of disks>
  3. Split the VG
    sudo splitvg -y <newvgname> -c2 -i <vgname>
  4. Make a note of pvids
    lspv
  5. Now you may export that split copy and import it elsewhere.
    sudo varyoffvg <newvgname>
sudo exportvg <newvgname>
